scene_description_enriched: Two male saints, identified by their halos, stand side-by-side. The saint on the left wears a blue tunic and a red cloak, and holds a black object resembling a key. The saint on the right wears a blue tunic and a gold-trimmed cloak, and holds a sword. Both have white beards and are depicted in a landscape setting with rolling blue hills and a bright blue sky. The overall impression is one of solemnity and religious devotion.
